website_summaries.verdict: The Kineta Relay from Saucony is a popular running shoe model that many runners have tried out. It’s for daily performance training and running activities, offering mild support and lightweight service to the wearer. Overall, the Kineta Relay has proven to be a reliable road running shoe.
pros: The breathable upper unit of the Kineta Relay keeps moisture away while maintaining a cool environment for the foot
The FORM2U Memory Foam technology provides a custom platform that’s unique to each wearer because it mimics the shape of the underside of the foot noted several runners
The color options for the Kineta Relay are numerous
Some runners appreciated the comfortable inner sleeve, which lets them have an easier time wearing and taking the shoe off
High abrasion EVA makes up the outsole unit of the Relay, which provides grip and more cushioning to the foot
It has a very light weight
cons: Most of the complaints about this shoe were about its outsole, which lacked any rubber for protection against wear and tear
Some runners felt that it was a bit tight in the forefoot area
Others noted that the mid-sole unit didn’t have as much effectiveness in terms of underfoot support

customer_reviews.title: US9/UE42 and they fit great. I've run roughly 150mi in these guys and ...
customer_reviews.text: US9/UE42 and they fit great. I've run roughly 150mi in these guys and they're holding strong. When you get them, you think they'll be an in-and-out pair but no-no-no. They have staying power. The feel: You're running with unlimited breath and endurance across the prairies of Wyoming when you come across a brown bear with her cubs; you stop to observe the beauty, but your presence isn't appreciated! Suddenly, you're being stormed! What do you do? Naturally you run for the hills knowing that you'll fly like a kite because you made the right shoe decision a few days earlier in Topeka before you left. You smart son of bitch.... Bears are scary, and the Kineta Relay saves lives...
customer_reviews.author: Tina Davis

customer_reviews.title: Product is not durable.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is one of the most comfortable I have ever owned. So why only 2 stars? Well, I bought several different models. The mesh ones are better made. But these olive/brown canvas ones here are junk. Because I wear about 15 different shoes, I only wore these 15 times max. They now have holes that have simply worn through and lots of stitching coming apart. They technically are still in one piece, but they would be very embarrassing to wear in public. On top of that, the soles are completely worn down (not through) but completely slick making these super dangerous on a wet sidewalk....like on an ice rink. Don't buy,
customer_reviews.author: Christopher McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Walking on cloud 9!
customer_reviews.text: Like walking on a cloud! You never know exactly what you're getting when the main support of a shoe is memory foam but these shoes are amazing (so far). I've only had them for a week but the sock fit is perfect (not too tight yet the heel doesn't slip and your foot can still breath). As always with Saucony, they run small so order at least a 1/2 up if you're new to the brand. Also, I wouldn't get these shoes for any kind of distance running and certainly not cross training but perfect for every day, walking, or running shorter distances. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, light , and stylish ‘kicks’
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of Saucony running shoes (new ones every 3months) and bought these for casual use outside the gym. The gel insoles are extremely comfy. I wasn’t hesitant that these shoes wouldn’t be supportive because they were so lightweight, but that’s not the case. I love the blue camo and this style was actually cheaper; good deal!
customer_reviews.author: DavidnKy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and light.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The have a memory foam like insert and are light and comfy. I stand and walk around a lot at work and my feet are well supported all day. I have other saucony shoes and they do seem to fight smaller then my other size 10 sneakers. The sole is made up from some soft foam like materia which I can see may not last long for running. However, for regular walking and working out At the gym they’ll be fine. I would buy again but maybe 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lajavrac

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for normal use.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for everyday use. I bought these shoes for walking but they are not very good for this use. The padding on the inside of the shoe is a memory foam material and when you walk a long distance, the foam compresses and causes a lot of pain on the bottom of you feet. These shoes are TERRIBLE for running, not very good for long distance walking, but very good for normal everyday use. The light weight is great, just with insole was either better or removable.
customer_reviews.author: IJ Hale

customer_reviews.title: GREAT shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my shoes!!! I use them as walking/yard work shoes and go everywhere in them. They are not QUITE as comfortable as my Newtons, but as they are not neon they are much more work-appropriate. The foamy bottom is soooo comfy and has taken a long time for me to beat down with my heels.
customer_reviews.author: K. Avery

customer_reviews.title: Junk soles
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are ok, except that there is no arch support and the soles wear out after maybe 20 wears. If they were super cheap then they might be 4 stars, but these are full price shoes that feel and last as if they were trash, cheapo shoes. Really disappointed because Saucony makes some other great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe for usual urban running. (And a great shoe for walking/working). It's very comfortable out of the box, and they are light as a feather. I use them for training and it's a great shoe for the price. The soles are soft, so the sole doesn't last a long time if you run very often and far, but I still love this shoe model. (You might want to add arch support if you need that kind of thing) This is my 3rd pair. Probably not a good shoe if you live somewhere where it rains a lot. The tread tends to get slippery after it wears down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Todd C

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son ordered these shoes for track. They're excellent shoes and have kept him from getting shin splints. He also wears the Saucony spikes and they're great too.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. This is the second pair I have purchased and I will continue to buy them as long as they make them. They are the lightest shoe I have ever owned and they are super comfortable. Memory foam insert is pretty thick to increase the comfort of walking/running in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Judge

customer_reviews.title: Saucony just jumped over jumpman
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned!!! These are more comfortable than any of my Jordans or adidas tubulars. These may not be as stylish as my other shoes but im at a point were i prefer comfort over style especially since im running around all day. I recommend these shoes to everyone and will be buying a couple more pairs of these. One thing these shoes are not the best for a Chicago winter or a rainy day but i still give them a five.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Soft shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Nice soft low back for those with heel/achilles issues. Breathable mesh upper. I just wish they'd last longer. We are needing to buy new ones every 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, I haven't worn a pair of shoes that has cost more than sixty dollars. That said, I have owned plenty of pairs of shoes in this price bracket and can say that these are the most comfortable I have ever worn. Very breathable, good support, and holding up well so far. Came with two pairs of laces, one set being bright green. I bought these shoes for running and ended up wearing them all day. As another poster wrote, buying half a size up may be best. My old shoes were size 11 but these runners fit me perfectly as 11.5's. For less than fifty dollars, I feel like I got a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: GDS

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sneakers available.
customer_reviews.text: Easily the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. I actually just bought these for a second time. I also have the black/ heather grey pair. These fit true to size, but if you get a half size larger in the ones with leather or denim, I'm sure they'll fit too. For the price, these can't be beat, and honestly, they look fresh too. I own air max, jordan, adidas, etc., I'm a sneaker head for sure, but nothing compares in comfort when it comes to the kineta relay, and that's a fact.
customer_reviews.author: Max McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable. Not a wide heel so not as stable feeling as other models. I like that this (black color) is not flashy though sleek looking. We'll see how it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: AnotherConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Didnt know what to expect when I bought this shoe but it was worth it. The shoe is really light and the most comfortable shoe I have owned in a while. Will definitely by this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a super light, minimal feature shoe
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a super light, minimal feature shoe, this is it! I have purchased many pairs of Sauconys over the years, always the same size. I should have ordered a 1/2 size larger as these appear to run small. Not painfully small, just noticeable. Great for walking, possibly running or cross training.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and lightweight, I have 2 pairs now and I love them Recommendation: As a runner, I really do not use this shoes for running, they are very soft, no support on the heel, no control, they are more, fresh, soft for everyday use and walk.....
customer_reviews.author: aldoruiz

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight shoe - would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, lightweight, wide soled shoe that fits very comfortably. I usually wear a 12.5 or 13 in Nike and the 12.5s in these were great. Didn't realize they were a sock-fit type shoe when I ordered but they are not constricting and the heel part doesn't rub (which is usually an issue for me) with that style of shoe. Mine came with grey and black sets of laces.
customer_reviews.author: BH_251

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves Saucony Running Shoes. They are the only running shoe he will buy. This is the 4th or 5th pair he has purchased and has loved all of them.
customer_reviews.author: CDB

customer_reviews.title: My favorite running shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this exact model. The last pair, I had for 3 years and I practitioner wore the soles down last the nubs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyfer

customer_reviews.title: super light weight,
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and I love how light in weight they are. Mesh weave allows air to help keep feet cool. Very comfortable fit for my size 11 feet. Very comfortable when jogging, and great price.
customer_reviews.author: WQ Guy

customer_reviews.title: So Light
customer_reviews.text: I really like these as a lightweight and breathable shoe to kick around in. The sole did start to wear thing kinda quickly when worn as a walking shoe but, at the price it's not a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: LB in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Love how light they are and how they feel
customer_reviews.text: Love how light they are and how they feel. This is my second pair. First one the bottom sole only lasted about 3 months. Shoe is no good after that. So I decided to try another,again I live how light and comfy they are. Again the second pair only lasted 6 weeks before I notice the bottom soles becoming ver warn out already.. will not purchas a third pair
customer_reviews.author: Donny H

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great. The lightest shoes I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. The lightest shoes I have ever worn. Very comfortable. The size 12 fitted as expected, same as the Propel Vista. My only concern is the durability of the soles, seeing that I run about 5 miles in them per week. I will test that over time. I am satisfied, will by again.
customer_reviews.author: RAY

customer_reviews.title: but I must say it was the best shoes I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: will buy another pair when the price goes down. but I must say it was the best shoes I've ever had. They wore out too fast in my opinion, but I really don't mind when you actually feel like your "GELLIN" with no gel. Thanks, wish you well on the quest for shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slippery on wet surfaces,soles wear out v. fast.
customer_reviews.text: My second pair; great for jogging on a dry surface. Grips on soles wear out fast, so these become extremely slippery even after light rain. 11.2.19 Update; 2nd pair: threw them in the garbage. Soles wore down even faster than the first pair, so it was like running barefoot, except they were extremely slippery and gave me absolutely no arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Hiker

customer_reviews.title: ... have only had them since December and sneakers look pretty worn down already
customer_reviews.text: I have only had them since December and sneakers look pretty worn down already. I am a walker and I haven't walked any more or less that what I did with my previous sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: When you find a shoe that works for you....
customer_reviews.text: Every foot is different. This size/brand/model is perfect for me. I have several different styles. They are very light weight! I use them for running but also for casual street wear.
customer_reviews.author: tony adams

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great Not Much Support
customer_reviews.text: These are my gym shows and I also use them to walk to work sometimes. I get a ton of compliments on them. They don't provide a ton of arch support so these may not be the shoe for you if that's an issue but I think they look really sharp. Super light too.
customer_reviews.author: Noah M. Glassman

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: 2 nd pair, I run 10 or so miles a week so I wanted a light comfortable shoe and I like these. I wear at the gym as well and I like that they are somewhat low profile so I don't twist my ankle when doing leg workouts. Only replaced last pair because I lose them. I wear 12 in Adidas and 12.5 is perfect so pretty true to size and I like the width as well
customer_reviews.author: MylesD

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look very very good with the black/blue combo as named. In reality, it is more so black with grayish bottoms with a black paint splatter look. However an extra set of laces are provided which are light blue. The shoes are SO light and very comfortable. I would go as far as saying these may be the best shoes I've ever purchased. You won't regret purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Will squeeze your toes to death
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is way too tight! I sold them to my husband that usually wears a 9-9.5, these were a size 12!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Don't appear to be very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very cushiony, but not enough support for me. Also, heel is starting to wear noticeably after only 25 miles walking or so. Have had good luck with other Saucony shoes, but not these!
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time around
customer_reviews.text: For me it fits as i have a narrow foot. While comfortable, for street/paved path running the tread wears quickly. This time around I am walk/running, so expect the see increase service life on tread. Still, a comfortable trainer.Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Gross

customer_reviews.title: These are good shoes if you use them for training or walking
customer_reviews.text: These are good shoes if you use them for training or walking. As daily work horse shoes look elsewhere. These are no NIKE's, If you want good quality shoes you will need to spend $100+. Also get the all black ones, with black soles. Black top and white soles don't look good in person.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very lightweight and comfortable! The only negative so far is that they ...
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish shoes! I have several pair of Saucony shoes that are used for running. I bought this pair for casual wear. These shoes are very lightweight and comfortable! The only negative so far is that they are too narrow!!!! Not enough room in the toe box!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the shoe. It's comfortable and matches a great pair of blue camo shorts that I purchased on Amazon as well. The only thing I was not pleased with was the SAUCONY logo on the side of the shoe; it looks like somone ironed it on which makes me almost want to just rip it off. It looks as if it would come off very easily. Other than that, I'm really love the shoe itself.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with nice soft soles!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and comfortable. The cushy soles feel great when walking, so far these are nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Blackwell 315

customer_reviews.title: Good, comfortable shoe.  Outer sole may not last.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes especially for the price. Memory foam material in the sole makes them super comfortable, but maybe not for everyone cause I don't believe it provides good arch support..just a word of caution. I am a little concerned with the bottom of the shoe wearing out very quickly since the material is so soft, but we'll see. I'm not using these for running (more of just a moving around the day kind of shoe) but I imagine they might wear out quickly if I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them so far!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these so far! As long as the memory foam doesn't wear out completely like his Sketchers did (they lasted only 4 months ) than I will be satisfied. He said that they are extremely comfy and don't make his feet so hot. They are very, very lightweight too.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sukut

customer_reviews.title: Super light, comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super light, comfy, padded (if you like that kind of running shoe) but it feels narrower than my other sauconys. And the heel cup is not super secure. I ended up giving them to my dad who has a longer narrower foot and they are good for him.
customer_reviews.author: joseph rusyn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortableness
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes. They are very comfortable and lightweight, but the outsole is not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mauro Pellegrini

customer_reviews.title: Slippers beware, these shoes are like clouds!
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable but do run small. Had to return the first pair, went by the size recommendations which said my normal size should fit but they were too small. Ordered 1/2 larger, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Winner
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. Lightweight . . so great for travel. My husband wears these all day long. These run a tad small so go up 1/2 size.. Five stars Saucony.
customer_reviews.author: Zsubi

customer_reviews.title: Combo of great arch support and "minimalist" style!
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe for running. Provides a good amount of sole and arch support, but light and "minimalist" around the sides, back, and top of the foot keeping the shoe light and well ventilated. So far I've taken them running about 5-8 miles, 4 times a week for a couple of weeks and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Pete McMorrow

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for a couple of hours
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit. Not bad for a quick run to the store or a date night. I wouldn't wear them all day or at work.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Better than most.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. I normally get wide but medium is fine. Just the right amount of support vs. flex. Like them much better than the Nike’s they replaced. The Navy camo pattern also gets lots of compliments from folks.
customer_reviews.author: JohnS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish shoes for traveling in comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight as advertised and great for travel. Not made for running or prolonged walking, but for the money ,comfortable and stylish shoes..
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H VanderVeen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes very lightweight and comfortable. I like them so much I bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend, he loves how comfortable they are and said would give them 5 stars if they had better arch support. All in all, great comfortable, very light shoes that can be worn all day. He's also gotten some compliments wearing these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: OC Shopper 59

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy men's shoes because they are more comfortable. In women's I wear a size 10 wide with a partial orthotic insert. This is a very comfortable shoe but I cannot wear it all day without the orthotic insert. I've had many compliments on this shoe and would but it again if it came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Claude

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and was delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Very tight on my toes, when driving the inner sole seems to slip under heal. Feels ok to stand and walk in. Love the color and was delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: I was not able to What a great looking and comfortable Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: At 1st I tried to cancel this order Thank God...I was not able to What a great looking and comfortable Sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Ret.SGM H Roman

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the fit as the shoe is very light
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Sauconu Grid Flex running shoes for the past 7 years but they are no longer available. These were the closest fit I could find. I'm very happy with the fit as the shoe is very light, narrow and has good support. I've logged about 75 miles with no issues. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa and KD

customer_reviews.title: Little Big
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple pair of Sauconys in size 14..I ordered these in 14 super comfortable but a little long.. You might wanna consider that when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: CCCjr

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes because they give you what you need
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes because they give you what you need, and leave out what you don't. They are the most breathable shoe I've ever had on my feet, and basically the most comfie too! Yay! I have been a Saucony shoe wearer for 16 years and they are the best shoes around.
customer_reviews.author: bigbobbers

customer_reviews.title: I like the style and the color and they are very ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and the color and they are very comfortable but do not walk on wet pavement because you will get wet feet.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Saucony is the best running shoes out there. These are light weight and I wore them for about 6 months of running. they were awesome and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: zak mullins

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the price, but ...
customer_reviews.text: The insole can't be removed. Returned because I couldn't use my custom orthotic.
customer_reviews.author: Stoochie

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy kicks
customer_reviews.text: These are truly my favorite sneakers when it comes to comfort. I'm a 6.5 and had to purchase a whole size up. I knew that because my first pair was from sports authority.
customer_reviews.author: mei3kids

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is on target and these shoes are super light weight and comfortable. I only use them for walking and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Fiore Household

customer_reviews.title: ... of this shoes during a sale and I was happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I bought one pair of this shoes during a sale and I was happy with this. Since I work in a chemistry lab and I don't want to put a pair of shoes potentially containing some chemicals in my luggage, I buy a new pair. I wear this during an international flight for 14 hours and my feet still feel good. I also wear this pair to travel all day and I feel comfortable with this. So I highly recommend this shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Qianli M.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Initial feel is great. I have worn Saucony running shoes for work for many years and have always loved them. I expect these will be the same if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are great for power walking. The only issue is the soles are soft and you need a new pair every 3 months but they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy All Day
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to wear at the gym, but so comfortable I took them on my trip to Europe where i walked all day with them, like stepping on clouds!
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Segura

customer_reviews.title: worn out after a month.
customer_reviews.text: You want to like this and when you put them on you love them but after having them for just a month I am not feeling the same. The soles basically worn off and they are no good. Only use them for running to preserve them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough shock absorption. I can’t imagine running in these.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough shock absorption. Every step I took I felt go right through me. I couldn’t wear them for a neighborhood walk. Good for the gym or hanging out.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and great for people with little to no ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars except they run a bit small. Super comfortable and great for people with little to no arch and narrow heel/foot!!! Other than size, the memory foam is awesome and would recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: cnhay5

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but keep indoors
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn much, but feel very comfortable. Saucony is a great brand and hasn't let me down yet. This said I will be keeping these mostly indoors as the bottom is the EVA foam, not a long wearing rubber. I don't think this will be a problem in the gym or on a indoor or outdoor track.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love
customer_reviews.text: So comfy, but they offer no support--literally hurt my foot. I am flat footed and this is a deal breaker. Also, the toe is too lose for someone with narrow feet
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: Big fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great support for high arches and miles of walking!! I’ve worn Saucony Kineta Relays for years and will continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Banner

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Plus
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair of Saucony Kineta tennis shoes I buy for my son. I waited fo a great deal because, by design, they are not durable. He says they are like walking on clouds. These are his casual everyday tennis shoes and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: AD & JD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! The foam for the contour of the foot is excellent. If I were to get another shoe, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rebholz

customer_reviews.title: For the price they're a good casual everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: For the price they're a good casual everyday shoe. Not for everyday running but that's not their target use. I feel the Saucony description as a light trainer or casual shoe was accurate. Comfortable shoe... I purchased a half size larger because some reviews said they ran small. I had to send them back and get my normal size in Saucony's. Which is my normal size for other shoes as well. I feel they run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Bsha24

customer_reviews.title: Good value for casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these with the intention of doing some light running in them, as well as using them for casual sneakers. The shoes are very lightweight and do not offer enough support for me to run in, but they work well for walking and casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable, though
customer_reviews.text: Not one of saucony'so higher quality products. Bought them for running but decided they wouldn't last long. They are comfortable, though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Begley

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sneakers I've ever owned. I didn't really liek them for running but they are amazing for pretty much everything else. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris In Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Small, but when they fit they’re super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They run a little small, but ended up fitting my wife perfectly so we kept them and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi momma

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable with nice soft insole,fit me perfectly and is light weight shoe. I will likely be ordering another color or two, for the price.!
customer_reviews.author: Shepp

customer_reviews.title: But overall a good
customer_reviews.text: Okay shoe could use more padding around the ankle area. But overall a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Not much put into these sneakers. My toe has ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much put into these sneakers. My toe has already created a hole on top of the sneaker after wearing only for a few months. Material is very thin.. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insanely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected. They are a great gym / jogging shoe. I was surprised with how comfortable these shoes were. They are light weight and the insoles are very supporting. Thinking of buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Klein

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are like wearing slippers all day
customer_reviews.text: Dude, these shoes are like wearing slippers all day, yet look like normal sneakers. Highly recommened, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Beat Grinder

customer_reviews.title: He machine washed and dried them this weekend and they came out good as new
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my 16 son. He loves them. He machine washed and dried them this weekend and they came out good as new. Much to my surprise.
customer_reviews.author: John David Short

customer_reviews.title: fits well and he feels comfortable. He was surprised how much he liked it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for my husband who runs every morning and he said he really likes the shoes. Light weight, fits well and he feels comfortable. He was surprised how much he liked it considering its low price compared to brand name shoes we paid 3x easily.
customer_reviews.author: L. Keel

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoe I have purchaed
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a number of running shoes over the years, and this one is the one I would rate as the best. Very comfortable throughout my exercise and running and walking.
customer_reviews.author: Poiema

customer_reviews.title: The perfect running shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite brand of shoes. Having been a runner all of my life, I love the feel of a shoe that has no weight, but is still unbelievably comfortable. I've only ever worn Saucony running shoes, and have been completely happy with every pair that I've purchased. I can't say that I will be changing brands anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a half size smaller IMHO
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable. I normally buy 10.5 with running shoes but for what ever reason they were too tight. I ended up giving them away to someone who could fit better into them
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable insoles!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but the bottom of the shoe did not have much traction
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: these are the most comfortable shoes I have bought
customer_reviews.text: my 2nd Pair, these are the most comfortable shoes I have bought, very lightweight, great for running with the feel of a slipper
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Thinking about buying another pair.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and lightweight, which I love. Thinking about buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: SBJ fam

customer_reviews.title: Styling in comfort
customer_reviews.text: Received multiple compliments on these babies. More of a casual shoe than for fitness. Sole construction soft. Shoes feel like a sock they are so comfortable. They are surprisingly supportive for the construction.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very light and flexible. I have used them to run about 3 miles on a treadmill a couple of times a week and they work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Saucony shoes! These are super comfortable and easy to wash!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: The shoes fit well and are comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well and are comfortable right out of the box. I will use them as casual shoes, so durability shouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: The urban camo pattern is a strategic advantage when running ...
customer_reviews.text: The urban camo pattern is a strategic advantage when running races in the city as other racers can not see how fast your feet are moving!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I tried a different model on in a store, so I knew that they tended to run somewhat small. I suggest ordering a pair about half size larger than you would normally. Other than that they are extremely comfortable, light weight, and excellent for working out .
customer_reviews.author: Spleeb

customer_reviews.title: Light and very thin all around - construction feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are light and very thin all around which makes the construction seem cheap and flimsy. Way smaller than any size 12 which I normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F.

product_meta.title: Saucony Men's Kineta Relay Men's Footwear

Kineta Relay men's footwear

- Color: White
- Collection: Spring - Summer
